description: AppResourcesUsageView extracts and displays the application resources usage information stored in the SRUDB.dat database of Windows 10 and Windows 11. The application resources usage data is automatically collected by Windows operating systems and includes the following information: Record ID, Timestamp, Application, User, Cycle Time (Foreground/Background), Face Time, Context Switches (Foreground/Background), Bytes Read/Written (Foreground/Background), Read/Write Operations Count (Foreground/Background).
shortcuts: NirSoft\AppResourcesUsageView - View application resources usage information
